markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shared Luck (Catfolk)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1263) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=211" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 11 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Cat's Luck](/Feats.aspx?ID=1253)

</column>

---

When you use Cat's Luck to reroll a Reflex saving throw, any creatures you choose within 10 feet who also just failed a Reflex saving throw against the same effect (such as a single spell) can also reroll their saving throws and use the better result.
name: Shared Luck (Catfolk)
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=211" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 11 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Cat's Luck](/Feats.aspx?ID=1253)

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Other creatures can benefit from your luck
</summary>
summary: Other creatures can benefit from your luck
